post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Hello Doom3world!

Since we got a little surface hacked (nothing serious) I'd advice everybody to change passwords as soon as you're finished reading this.

To do so go to your user profile and simply change it:
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/profil ... ditprofile

Thanks, the management...

post.author: just1n
post.body: Ah. Well. This could be worst... Like have our posts count deleted...! What would I live for.
